basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Domain admin username for new domain
basics.toolTip: Domain admin for your new domain

constraints.validationMessage: Username must be between 6 and 20 characters and can only contain numbers or the following characters: underscore (_), hyphen (-) or dot (.). Please note (.) or (-) is not permitted at the beginning or end of the username. (_) is permitted at the beginning or end of the username.

basics.name: adminCredentials
basics.toolTip: Complex password for domain admin account

constraints.validationMessage: Password must be at least 12 characters long and have 3 out of the following: one number, one lower case, one upper case, or one special character

elements.name: createChildDomain
elements.label: Create Child Domain Name
elements.toolTip: Do you want a child domain?

elements.name: createSecondDc
elements.label: Create 2 Domain Controllers
elements.toolTip: Do you want 2 DCs in each domain?

elements.name: DomainName
elements.label: Root Domain Name
elements.toolTip: Full FQDN name for the forest root domain.

constraints.validationMessage: The root domain name must be at least 4 - 63 characters long and contain a DNS TLD extension, for example .com or .local. Only a hyphen (-) character is allowed.

elements.name: ChildDomainName
elements.label: Child Domain Name
elements.toolTip: SHORT name for the child domain. New AD trees are not allowed. If you have selected not to install a child domain, this field will be ignored

constraints.validationMessage: The child domain name must be at least 4 - 63 characters long. No TLD extensions allowed in a child domain.

options.text: The next section below will create a new vNET in your tenant. If you have other vNETs that you require this new vNET to communicate with (peering), make sure the IP Address range you choose doesnt overlap with your other vNETs

label.toolTip: This will create a new vNET in your tenant. If you have other vNETs that you require this new vNET to communicate with (peering), make sure the IP Address range you choose doesnt overlap with your other vNETs

constraints.validationMessage: Please specify a valid public ip address for your external DNS forwarder
constraints.toolTip: DNS forwarder for all non-domain (external) related DNS queries

elements.name: VMSize
elements.label: Active Directory virtual machine size
elements.toolTip: The size of the virtual machines that will be used for all domain controllers.

options.text: The next section confirms what host names you would like for your new DCs and IP addresses. Confirm that the DC IP addresses selected are within the DC Subnet address range you selected for your vNET otherwise the deployment will fail.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

elements.name: RootDC1Name
elements.label: Root DC 1 Name
elements.toolTip: DC name for the first DC in your forest root domain.

constraints.validationMessage: The DC Name must be between 2 and 15 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

elements.name: RootDC1IPAddress
elements.label: Root DC 1 IP Address
elements.toolTip: DC IP for the first DC in your forest root domain. Confirm this IP is in the correct address range in the new vNET you just selected. Addresses need to start from x.x.x.4 as the first 3 addresses are reserved by Azure.

constraints.validationMessage: Please specify a valid ip4 private address that matches the subnet range in the new vNet your creating. Addresses need to start from x.x.x.4 as the first 3 addresses are reserved by Azure.

elements.name: RootDC2Name
elements.label: Root DC 2 Name
elements.toolTip: DC name for the 2nd DC in your forest root domain. If you chose not to install a 2nd DC, this field will be ignored

constraints.validationMessage: The DC Name must be between 2 and 15 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

elements.name: RootDC2IPAddress
elements.label: Root DC 2 IP Address
elements.toolTip: DC IP for the 2nd DC in your forest root domain. Confirm this IP is in the correct address range in the new vNET you just selected. If you chose not to install a 2nd DC, this field will be ignored

constraints.validationMessage: Please specify a valid ip4 private address that matches the subnet range in the new vNet your creating. Addresses need to start from x.x.x.4 as the first 3 addresses are reserved by Azure.

constraints.validationMessage: The DC Name must be between 2 and 15 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.
